rooms.description: A wide entrance hall for initial entry and circulation
Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the southern facade to enhance natural light and Vastu compliance, offering a view of the terrace and garden.
Open dining space adjacent to the kitchen area; designed for seamless flow between spaces
Modern kitchen with high-efficiency ventilation and natural lighting from east facing windows.
Guest room ensuring privacy and ample light, located on the east side for positive energy flow
Additional guest room with en-suite bathroom, designed per Vastu norms for west alignment

openings.description: Main entry door placed at the center of north facade to harness auspicious energy as per Vastu.
Floor-to-ceiling windows installed in the living room to maximize natural light and ventilation.
East-facing windows for effective morning sunlight in kitchen area, supporting optimal cooking environment.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with south-east facing window to promote calm and positive energy.
Primary bedroom on the west side, ensuring privacy and natural ventilation.
Additional bedroom designed for balanced energy flow, placed with east or north facing windows.
Third bedroom ensuring comfort and adherence to Vastu by aligning its entrance towards the positive cardinal direction.
Dedicated dressing space adjacent to master bedroom for convenience.
En-suite bathroom for the master bedroom, designed with moisture-resistant materials and adequate ventilation.
Common bathroom for other bedrooms, ensuring privacy and Vastu-compliant layout.

openings.description: South-east facing window to ensure positive energy and ample morning light.
Windows designed for natural ventilation across bedrooms on east or north facades, aligning with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.description: Rooftop terrace offering panoramic views, designed for relaxation and social gatherings with built-in seating areas.

openings.description: Staircase providing access from first floor to the rooftop terrace, ensuring safe and unobstructed movement.
